title: Pass all liquid-spec tests
description:
Goal: Get 100% pass rate on liquid-spec test suites.

Current status:
- Basics: 616/616 (100%)
- Liquid Ruby: 1412/1543 (91.5%)
- Shopify Production: 1680/1849 (90.9%)

Main failure categories to investigate:
1. Dynamic drops / LoaderDrop - runtime callbacks
2. Ruby quirks (int|size returns 8)
3. Edge cases in filters/tags

title: Implement blank feature for whitespace suppression
description:
Ruby Liquid considers blocks blank when they contain only tags (no actual output) and suppresses their whitespace.

Example: {% for i in (1..10) %} {% assign foo = 'bar' %} {% endfor %}
Expected: '' (empty)
Got: '          ' (whitespace)

This causes 13 BlankTest failures and 2 benchmark differences.
close_reason: Implemented blank feature with compile-time analysis. All blank tests pass (21/21).

title: Refactor liquid.zig with comptime optimizations
close_reason: Added FilterKind enum and comptime string map infrastructure

title: Fix numberToString overflow panic on large floats
close_reason: Added range check before i64 conversion and handle NaN/Infinity

title: Decouple liquid engine from json.Value types
description: The liquid library should be independent of the JSON-RPC test environment. Currently it uses std.json.Value throughout, but it should define its own Value type abstraction so it can be used as a standalone library without JSON dependencies.

title: Fix missing/broken filters: escape, strip_html, url_encode, url_decode, sort_natural
Implement complexity 100-130 features
description: String filters, increment/decrement counters, comment tag, raw tag, echo tag. Current max complexity: 95.

title: Further modularize liquid.zig
description: liquid.zig is still ~6900 lines. Consider extracting: parser.zig, ir.zig, vm.zig, context.zig

title: Fix render errors (204 errors)
description: 204 tests result in errors rather than failures. These are likely crashes, invalid JSON, or protocol issues that need investigation.
